-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Typeclasses and instances for converting between types (deprecated)
--   
--   This is a port of John Goerzen's convertible package, intended to
--   distinguish between conversions which are guaranteed to succeed and
--   those which might fail. It uses the attempt package, which in turn
--   uses the failure package, so that this package is fully compatible
--   with the failure framework.
--   
--   This package currently contains all of the typeclasses and instances
--   for convertible. However, as these features are ported to the
--   convertible package, this package will be left with only the instances
--   for converting to and from text types (String, ByteString (lazy and
--   strict) and Text (lazy and strict).
--   
--   Be aware that conversions to and from bytestrings assume UTF-8
--   encoding. If a different encoding is desired, you can use a newtype
--   wrapper and declare an instance of <tt>ConvertAttempt</tt> or
--   <tt>ConvertSuccess</tt> on it.
--   
--   The main module to import is <a>Data.Convertible.Text</a>.
@package convertible-text
@version 0.4.0.2


module Data.Convertible.Base

-- | A typeclass that represents something that can attempt a conversion.
--   An <tt>ConvertAttempt a b</tt> instance represents an <tt>a</tt> that
--   might be convertible to a <tt>b</tt>.
class ConvertAttempt a b
convertAttempt :: ConvertAttempt a b => a -> Attempt b
failure :: Failure e f => forall v. e -> f v

-- | A typeclass that represents something that guarantees a successful
--   conversion. A <tt>ConvertSuccess a b</tt> instance represents an
--   <tt>a</tt> that can be converted to a <tt>b</tt>.
class ConvertSuccess a b
convertSuccess :: ConvertSuccess a b => a -> b

-- | A convenience synonym for <a>convertSuccess</a>
cs :: ConvertSuccess x y => x -> y

-- | A convenience synonym for <a>convertAttempt</a>
ca :: ConvertAttempt x y => x -> Attempt y

-- | Wraps any <a>Exception</a> which could occur during a
--   <a>convertAttempt</a>.
data ConversionException
ConversionException :: e -> ConversionException

-- | Convert from one type of data to another. Raises an exception if there
--   is an error with the conversion. For a function that does not raise an
--   exception in that case, see <a>convertAttempt</a>.
convertUnsafe :: ConvertAttempt a b => a -> b

-- | Calls <a>convertAttempt</a>, wrapping any <a>Exception</a>s in a
--   <a>ConversionException</a>
convertAttemptWrap :: (ConvertAttempt a b, Failure ConversionException m) => a -> m b

-- | Template Haskell to derive <a>ConvertAttempt</a> instances from the
--   corresponding <a>ConvertSuccess</a> instances.
deriveAttempts :: [(Q Type, Q Type)] -> Q [Dec]
instance Typeable ConversionException
instance Exception ConversionException
instance Show ConversionException
instance ConvertAttempt a a
instance ConvertSuccess a a


module Data.Convertible.Utils

-- | Utility function to perform bounds checking as part of a conversion.
--   
--   Does this be examining the bounds of the destination type, converting
--   to the type of the source via <tt>safeConvert</tt>, comparing to the
--   source value. Results in an error if the conversion is out of bounds.
boundedConversion :: (Ord a, Bounded b, Show a, Show b, ConvertAttempt a Integer, ConvertAttempt b Integer, Typeable a, Typeable b) => (a -> Attempt b) -> a -> Attempt b
data ConvertBoundsException v a
ConvertBoundsException :: v -> v -> a -> ConvertBoundsException v a

-- | Useful for defining <a>Typeable</a> instances. Example:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance Typeable TimeOfDay where
--       typeOf _ = mkTypeName "TimeOfDay"
--   </pre>
mkTypeName :: String -> TypeRep

-- | Useful for defining conversions that are implemented in terms of other
--   conversions via an intermediary type. Instead of:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance Convertible CalendarTime POSIXTime where
--       safeConvert a = do r &lt;- safeConvert a
--                          safeConvert (r :: ClockTime)
--   </pre>
--   
--   we can now write:
--   
--   <pre>
--   instance Convertible CalendarTime POSIXTime where
--       safeConvert = convertVia (undefined::ClockTime)
--   </pre>
--   
--   which does the same thing -- converts a CalendarTime to a ClockTime,
--   then a ClockTime to a POSIXTime, both using existing
--   <tt>Convertible</tt> instances.
convertAttemptVia :: (ConvertAttempt a b, ConvertAttempt b c) => b -> a -> Attempt c

-- | Same as <a>convertAttemptVia</a> for <a>ConvertSuccess</a>
convertSuccessVia :: (ConvertSuccess a b, ConvertSuccess b c) => b -> a -> c
instance Typeable2 ConvertBoundsException
instance (Show v, Show a, Typeable v, Typeable a) => Exception (ConvertBoundsException v a)
instance (Show v, Show a) => Show (ConvertBoundsException v a)


-- | Instances to convert between Map and association list.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Map
instance ConvertAttempt (Map k a) [(k, a)]
instance ConvertSuccess (Map k a) [(k, a)]
instance Ord k => ConvertAttempt [(k, a)] (Map k a)
instance Ord k => ConvertSuccess [(k, a)] (Map k a)


-- | Numeric instances for Convertible.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
--   
--   These instances perform conversion between numeric types such as
--   Double, Int, Integer, Rational, and the like. Here are some notes
--   about the conversion process:
--   
--   Conversions from floating-point types such as Double to integral types
--   are dune via the <a>truncate</a> function. This is a somewhat
--   arbitrary decision; if you need different behavior, you will have to
--   write your own instance or manually perform the conversion.
--   
--   All conversions perform bounds checking. If a value is too large for
--   its destination type, you will get a <tt>ConvertError</tt> informing
--   you of this. Note that this behavior differs from functions in the
--   Haskell standard libraries, which will perform the conversion without
--   error, but give you garbage in the end.
--   
--   Conversions do not perform precision checking; loss of precision is
--   implied with certain conversions (for instance, Double to Float) and
--   this is not an error.
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Num
instance ConvertAttempt Word64 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Word64
instance ConvertAttempt Word32 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Word32
instance ConvertAttempt Word16 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Word16
instance ConvertAttempt Word8 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Word8
instance ConvertAttempt Word Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Word
instance ConvertAttempt Int64 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Int64
instance ConvertAttempt Int32 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Int32
instance ConvertAttempt Int16 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Int16
instance ConvertAttempt Int8 Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Int8
instance ConvertAttempt Int Char
instance ConvertAttempt Char Int
instance ConvertSuccess Rational Float
instance ConvertSuccess Rational Double
instance ConvertSuccess Float Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Float Double
instance ConvertSuccess Double Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Double Float
instance ConvertSuccess Word64 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Word64
instance ConvertSuccess Word32 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Word32
instance ConvertSuccess Word16 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Word16
instance ConvertSuccess Word8 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Word8
instance ConvertSuccess Word Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Word
instance ConvertSuccess Int64 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Int64
instance ConvertSuccess Int32 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Int32
instance ConvertSuccess Int16 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Int16
instance ConvertSuccess Int8 Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Int8
instance ConvertSuccess Int Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Int
instance ConvertSuccess Word64 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Word64
instance ConvertSuccess Word32 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Word32
instance ConvertSuccess Word16 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Word16
instance ConvertSuccess Word8 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Word8
instance ConvertSuccess Word Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Word

instance ConvertAttempt Float Int64
instance ConvertSuccess Int32 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Int32
instance ConvertSuccess Int16 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Int16
instance ConvertSuccess Int8 Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Int8
instance ConvertSuccess Int Float
instance ConvertAttempt Float Int

instance ConvertSuccess Word16 Double
instance ConvertAttempt Double Word16

instance ConvertSuccess Int16 Double
instance ConvertAttempt Double Int16

instance ConvertAttempt Double Int8
instance ConvertSuccess Int Double
instance ConvertAttempt Double Int
instance ConvertSuccess Rational Integer
instance ConvertSuccess Integer Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Float Integer
instance ConvertSuccess Integer Float

instance ConvertSuccess Integer Double

-- | Numeric instances for Convertible for C types. See comments in

--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE

instance ConvertAttempt Int16 CSChar
instance ConvertAttempt CSChar Int16
instance ConvertAttempt Int8 CSChar
instance ConvertAttempt CSChar Int8
instance ConvertAttempt Int CSChar
instance ConvertAttempt CSChar Int
instance ConvertAttempt Word64 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Word64
instance ConvertAttempt Word32 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Word32
instance ConvertAttempt Word16 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Word16
instance ConvertAttempt Word8 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Word8
instance ConvertAttempt Word CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Word
instance ConvertAttempt Int64 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Int64
instance ConvertAttempt Int32 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Int32
instance ConvertAttempt Int16 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Int16
instance ConvertAttempt Int8 CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Int8
instance ConvertAttempt Int CChar
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Int
instance ConvertSuccess Rational CDouble
instance ConvertSuccess CDouble Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Float CDouble
instance ConvertSuccess CDouble Float
instance ConvertSuccess Double CDouble
instance ConvertSuccess CDouble Double
instance ConvertSuccess Rational CFloat
instance ConvertSuccess CFloat Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Float CFloat
instance ConvertSuccess CFloat Float
instance ConvertSuccess Double CFloat
instance ConvertSuccess CFloat Double
instance ConvertSuccess Word64 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Word64
instance ConvertSuccess Word32 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Word32
instance ConvertSuccess Word16 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Word16
instance ConvertSuccess Word8 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Word8
instance ConvertSuccess Word CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Word

instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Int64
instance ConvertSuccess Int32 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Int32
instance ConvertSuccess Int16 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Int16
instance ConvertSuccess Int8 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Int8
instance ConvertSuccess Int CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Int
instance ConvertSuccess Word64 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Word64
instance ConvertSuccess Word32 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Word32
instance ConvertSuccess Word16 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Word16
instance ConvertSuccess Word8 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Word8
instance ConvertSuccess Word CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Word
instance ConvertSuccess Int64 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Int64
instance ConvertSuccess Int32 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Int32
instance ConvertSuccess Int16 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Int16
instance ConvertSuccess Int8 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Int8
instance ConvertSuccess Int CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Int
instance ConvertAttempt Word CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Word CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Word8 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Word8 CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Word64 CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Word32 CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Word16 CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Rational CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Integer CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Integer CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Int CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Int CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Int8 CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Int64 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Int32 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Int32 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Int16 CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Int16 CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt Float CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt Float CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt Double CDouble

instance ConvertAttempt CUShort Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CULong Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CULLong Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CUInt Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CUChar Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CSize Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CShort Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CSChar Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CLong Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CLLong Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CInt Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Rational
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Float
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat Double
instance ConvertAttempt CFloat CDouble
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Rational
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Integer
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Float
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble Double
instance ConvertAttempt CDouble CFloat
instance ConvertAttempt CChar Integer


-- | Instances to convert between various time structures, both old- and
--   new-style.
--   
--   At present, this module does not do full input validation. That is, it
--   is possible to get an exception rather than a Left result from these
--   functions if your input is invalid, particularly when converting from
--   the old-style System.Time structures.
--   
--   Copyright (C) 2009 John Goerzen <a>jgoerzen@complete.org</a>
--   
--   All rights reserved.
--   
--   For license and copyright information, see the file LICENSE
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Time
instance ConvertAttempt ZonedTime CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertSuccess ZonedTime CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt CalendarTime CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertSuccess CalendarTime CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess Int CTime
instance ConvertAttempt Int CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime Int
instance ConvertAttempt Double CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime Double
instance ConvertAttempt Integer CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime Integer
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime CTime
instance ConvertAttempt CTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Double CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime Double
instance ConvertSuccess Integer CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime Integer
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime CTime
instance ConvertSuccess CTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt TimeDiff Double
instance ConvertAttempt TimeDiff Rational
instance ConvertAttempt TimeDiff Integer
instance ConvertAttempt Double TimeDiff
instance ConvertAttempt Integer TimeDiff
instance ConvertSuccess TimeDiff Double
instance ConvertSuccess TimeDiff Rational
instance ConvertSuccess TimeDiff Integer
instance ConvertSuccess Double TimeDiff
instance ConvertSuccess Integer TimeDiff
instance ConvertSuccess NominalDiffTime TimeDiff
instance ConvertSuccess TimeDiff NominalDiffTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertSuccess ZonedTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt ZonedTime ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess ZonedTime ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt CalendarTime UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt CalendarTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess CalendarTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess CalendarTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess CalendarTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt ZonedTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt ZonedTime UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertSuccess ZonedTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess ZonedTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime Int
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime Double
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime Integer
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime Rational
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime Double
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime Integer
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Double UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt Int UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt Integer UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt Rational UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess Double UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess Int UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess Integer UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess Rational UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt UTCTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime UTCTime
instance ConvertSuccess UTCTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime UTCTime
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime Int
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime Double
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime Rational
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime Integer
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime Double
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime Rational
instance ConvertSuccess POSIXTime Integer
instance ConvertAttempt Double POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt Int POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt Integer POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt Rational POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Double POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Int POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Integer POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Rational POSIXTime
instance ConvertSuccess Integer ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt Integer ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime Integer
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime Integer
instance ConvertSuccess CalendarTime ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt CalendarTime ClockTime
instance ConvertSuccess ClockTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt ZonedTime CalendarTime
instance ConvertAttempt TimeDiff NominalDiffTime
instance ConvertAttempt ClockTime POSIXTime
instance ConvertAttempt CalendarTime ZonedTime
instance ConvertAttempt POSIXTime ClockTime
instance ConvertAttempt NominalDiffTime TimeDiff


-- | Instances to convert amongst <a>String</a>s, strict bytestrings, lazy
--   bytestrings, strict text and lazy text.
module Data.Convertible.Instances.Text
instance ConvertSuccess Text Text
instance ConvertSuccess Text ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Text ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Text [Char]
instance ConvertSuccess Text Text
instance ConvertSuccess Text ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Text ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Text [Char]
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString Text
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString Text
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString [Char]
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString Text
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString Text
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess ByteString [Char]
instance ConvertSuccess [Char] Text
instance ConvertSuccess [Char] Text
instance ConvertSuccess [Char] ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess [Char] ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Text Text
instance ConvertAttempt Text String
instance ConvertAttempt Text ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Text ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Text Text
instance ConvertAttempt Text String
instance ConvertAttempt Text ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Text ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt String Text
instance ConvertAttempt String Text
instance ConvertAttempt String ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt String ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Text
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Text
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString String
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Text
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Text
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString String
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString ByteString


-- | Instances of <a>ConvertSuccess</a> and <a>ConvertAttempt</a> for
--   <a>String</a>, along with instances for bytestrings and text (lazy and
--   strict).
module Data.Convertible.Instances.String
data InvalidDayException
InvalidDayException :: String -> InvalidDayException
data InvalidBoolException
InvalidBoolException :: String -> InvalidBoolException
instance Typeable InvalidDayException
instance Typeable InvalidBoolException
instance Show InvalidDayException
instance Show InvalidBoolException
instance ConvertSuccess Rational Text
instance ConvertSuccess Rational Text
instance ConvertSuccess Rational ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Rational ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Int Text
instance ConvertSuccess Int Text
instance ConvertSuccess Int ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Int ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Bool Text
instance ConvertSuccess Bool Text
instance ConvertSuccess Bool ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Bool ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Day Text
instance ConvertSuccess Day Text
instance ConvertSuccess Day ByteString
instance ConvertSuccess Day ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Text Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Text Rational
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Rational
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Rational
instance ConvertAttempt Text Int
instance ConvertAttempt Text Int
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Int
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Int
instance ConvertAttempt Text Bool
instance ConvertAttempt Text Bool
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Bool
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Bool
instance ConvertAttempt Text Day
instance ConvertAttempt Text Day
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Day
instance ConvertAttempt ByteString Day
instance ConvertAttempt [Char] Rational
instance ConvertSuccess Rational [Char]
instance ConvertAttempt [Char] Integer
instance ConvertSuccess Integer [Char]
instance ConvertAttempt [Char] Int
instance ConvertSuccess Int [Char]
instance ConvertAttempt [Char] Bool
instance ConvertSuccess Bool [Char]
instance Exception InvalidBoolException
instance ConvertAttempt [Char] Day
instance ConvertSuccess Day [Char]
instance Exception InvalidDayException
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Text
instance ConvertAttempt Rational Text
instance ConvertAttempt Rational String
instance ConvertAttempt Rational ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Rational ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Int Text
instance ConvertAttempt Int Text
instance ConvertAttempt Int String
instance ConvertAttempt Int ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Int ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Day Text
instance ConvertAttempt Day Text
instance ConvertAttempt Day String
instance ConvertAttempt Day ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Day ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Bool Text
instance ConvertAttempt Bool Text
instance ConvertAttempt Bool String
instance ConvertAttempt Bool ByteString
instance ConvertAttempt Bool ByteString


-- | Collection of ready-made <tt>ConvertSuccess</tt> and
--   <tt>ConvertAttempt</tt> instances. See each individual module for more
--   docs:
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.C</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Map</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Num</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Time</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.Text</a>
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances.String</a>
--   
--   You can find a list of these instances at <tt>ConvertSuccess</tt> and
--   <tt>ConvertAttempt</tt>.
module Data.Convertible.Instances


-- | This is a library to provide a uniform interface for safe conversions
--   between different types of data. To get started reading about it,
--   consult:
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Base</a> for information about the conversions
--   themselves
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Utils</a> for helpful tools for people writing
--   <tt>Convertible</tt> instances
--   
--   <a>Data.Convertible.Instances</a> for a large collection of
--   ready-built <tt>Convertible</tt> instances
--   
--   You can import these modules individually, or this module will export
--   the entire library for you.
module Data.Convertible.Text
